Title: Rang De Basanti
Writer: Renzil D'Silva (screenplay), Prasoon Joshi (dialogue), Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra (screenplay), Kamlesh Pandey (story)
Actors: Aamir Khan, Siddharth, Sharman Joshi, Kunal Kapoor
Plot: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 17 wins & 19 nominations.
